lu.uni.geko.mapping
Class Pc2AvMapResolver

java.lang.Object
  lu.uni.geko.common.AbstractModelTransformer<N2NMap<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject,org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject>>
      lu.uni.geko.mapping.Pc2AvMapResolver

public class Pc2AvMapResolver
extends AbstractModelTransformer<N2NMap<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject,org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject>>

Resolves a mapping from pointcut elements to advice elements by loading, guessing or completing.

guessPc2AvMap

private N2NMap<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject,org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> guessPc2AvMap(Set<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> pcElements,
                                                                                          Set<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> avElements)
Guesses and returns a mapping from pointcut elements to advice elements using the given pointcut and advice elements.

Parameters:
pcElements - a set of pointcut elements

the n-to-n mapping from pointcut elements to advice elements

guessPc2AvMapUsingExistingMap

private void guessPc2AvMapUsingExistingMap(N2NMap<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject,org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> pc2AvN2NMap,
                                           Set<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> pcElements,
                                           Set<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> avElements)
Guesses a mapping from pointcut elements to advice elements using the given pointcut and advice elements and stores the mapping entries in the given N2NMap.

Parameters:
pc2AvN2NMap - a n-to-n map into which the mapping from pointcut to advice elements should be stored
pcElements - a set of pointcut elements
avElements - a set of advice elements

guessMappingForPcElement

private org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject guessMappingForPcElement(org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject pcElement,
                                                               Set<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> avElements)
Guesses the mapping for the given pointcut element using the given advice elements and returns the unambiguously matched advice element (if existing and null otherwise). The matching is performed using the registered extensions for the extension point lu.uni.geko.mapping.uidcalculatorext.

Parameters:
pcElement - a pointcut element
avElements - a set of advice elements
Returns:
the advice element that unambiguously matches the given pointcut element (if existing and null otherwise)
See Also:
UIDCalculatorExt

loadPc2AvMapping

private N2NMap<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject,org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> loadPc2AvMapping()
Loads and returns the mapping from pointcut elements to advice elements using the URI of this resolver.

Returns:
the n-to-n mapping from pointcut elements to advice elements

completeMappingByGuessing

private void completeMappingByGuessing(N2NMap<org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject,org.eclipse.emf.ecore.EObject> pc2AvN2NMap)
Completes the given mapping from pointcut elements to advice elements by guessing mapping entries for all pointcut and advice elements that have not been mapped so far.

Parameters:
pc2AvN2NMap - the n-to-n map which contains the mapping from pointcut to advice elements that should be completed

letUserCompleteMap
